snippet: Phillip Thies, who worked in the ring under the name Damien Demento, is having his first art show, in TriBeCa
abstract: Phillip Thies, who worked in the ring under the name Damien Demento, is having his first art show, in TriBeCa

headline.main: From Inside a Bad-Guy Wrestler, a Brutal Artist Screamed for Release
headline.print_headline: Inside a Wrestler, A Dark Artist Screaming for Release
